title: "META HAS PROMOTED HOMOPHOBIC, RACIST, AND FAKE NEWS POSTS" - YouTube
snippet: Elisabetta Piccolotti mentions a study by Professor Fabio Giglietto from the University of Urbino that demonstrates how META has favored homophobic, racist, or fake news posts over content from politicians, influencing elections worldwide.
description: A YouTube video discussing a study by Professor Fabio Giglietto from the University of Urbino that reveals how META's algorithms promote harmful content over political content, potentially impacting elections.

title: Giornata Internazionale di Studi - Can the Damage of Destructive Polarization Be Repaired?
snippet: Giada Marino, Bruna Almeida Paroni, and Fabio Giglietto (University of Urbino Carlo Bo) are presenting a study titled 'The Brazilian Digital Battlefield: Investigating The Dynamics Of Political Information Campaigns In Post-Bolsonaro Era'. The study investigates the dynamics of misinformation campaigns on Facebook in the context of Brazil's political shifts, focusing on the period from the 2022 elections to the aftermath of the attempted coup on January 8, 2023.
description: Fabio Giglietto of the University of Urbino Carlo Bo is presenting a study on misinformation campaigns in Brazil, focusing on the period following the 2022 elections and the attempted coup on January 8, 2023.

title: DIGITAL SOCIAL NETWORK ANALYSIS - Lecturer: Fabio Giglietto - A.Y. 2025/2026 - Uniurb
snippet: This page describes the course 'DIGITAL SOCIAL NETWORK ANALYSIS' taught by Fabio Giglietto at the University of Urbino Carlo Bo for the academic year 2025/2026. It mentions his role as the lecturer and outlines the course objectives, program, and learning outcomes.
description: This webpage from the University of Urbino Carlo Bo describes the 'DIGITAL SOCIAL NETWORK ANALYSIS' course taught by Fabio Giglietto for the academic year 2025/2026, outlining the course objectives and program.

title: veraai.eu
description: This content appears to be about Fabio Giglietto's involvement with the Vera AI project at the University of Urbino. It suggests a connection between him and the Vera AI initiative.
